topic.title: QueueMetrics Integration
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Queue Metrices Integration on Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX.

section.title: Version 1.4.1
section.p:
Released Date: February 27, 2020
Fixed the issue that QueueMetrics Integration App would be disabled automatically.

ul.li:
Optimized the mechanism of applying configuration changes to improve the system stability.
You don't need to click Apply button to reload Asterisk if you save unchanged configurations.
If no Apply button appears after you save some specific configuration changes, then the configurations can be saved without reloading Asterisk.
The Queue Metrics Integration App is free, no more license from Yeastar is needed.
Updated Russian and Italian web interface.
Optimized the purchase process of the QueueMetrics account.
Added support for German Web interface.
Added support for sending verification email to activate QueueMetrics Live ID.
Added support for sending welcome email with login information when QueueMetrics Live ID applied.
Optimized Web GUI: show “Current QueueMetrics Live ID” filed on the page after connected to QueueMetrics Live.
Optimized the selection options of “Time Zone” when applying a demo QueueMetrics Live ID: specify time zone with countries and cities.
Added the QueueMetrics Live Integration Application’s log into the PBX system logs.

Optimized Web GUI: if QueueMetrics ID had been applied via the App, the Web GUI would not show the link of applying QueueMetrics. Users can only apply one QueueMetrics ID from the QueueMetrics Live Integration App.

Optimized Web GUI: added “QueueMetrics Login Username” field on the page of applying QueueMetrics ID. The login username is “demoadmin”. Users should log in QueueMetrics using the fixed username “demoadmin”.
Optimized Web GUI: added “Confirm Password” field on the page of applying QueueMetrics ID. Users need to input password twice to ensure the password is correct.
Optimized QueueMetrics visit link to avoid web cache.
Added response from QueueMetrics into the PBX system logs.
